content.text: I'm doing well! I'm excited to start college soon.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll have a great time. What are you looking forward to most?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things. I'm also excited to be independent and live on my own.
That's all really exciting! I'm sure you'll do great. What are you going to study in college?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business.
That's a good choice. Business is a very versatile major that can lead to a lot of different career paths.
Yeah, I think it would be a good fit for me. I'm also interested in marketing and entrepreneurship.
Those are both great fields! I'm sure you'll be successful in whatever you do.
You're welcome! By the way, I love the band Van Halen. They're one of my favorites.
They're great! I've been listening to them since I was a kid.
Me too! I saw them in concert a few years ago and it was amazing.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
You should definitely go if you ever have the chance. They put on a great show.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
